# nxos_feature_lldp (Data Source)

This data source can read the LLDP feature configuration.

- API Documentation: [fmLldp](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-3-1/docs/Feature%20Management/fm:Lldp/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nxos_feature_lldp" "example" {
}
```

- `id` (String) The distinguished name of the object.
